page.title: 08FRANKTON FISHPONDS
page.content: { FRANKTON FISHPONDS}ARE WELL KNOWN FOR FISHING.{MONKS}BUILT THE FISHPONDS BUT MR. PADGET OWNS THEM NOW. THE {MONKS}FILLED IT WITH FISH TO CATCH AND THEN EAT. THE FISHPONDS ARE SAID TO BE {HAUNTED.}THE STORY IS, IT WAS WINTER AND A MAN WANTED TO FISH SO HE MADE A HOLE IN THE ICE ON THE FISHPOND AND PUT HIS LINE IN. HE THEN SAW A BLACK DOG HE WENT OVER THE ICE AND GOT THE DOG OUT THEY WERE NEARLY AT THE EDGE WHEN THE ICE BROKE AND THEY BOTH DROWNED. LOTS OF PEOPLE GET SCARED AND DON'T GO TO THE FISHPONDS, ESPECIALLY AT NIGHT BECAUSE THAT'S WHEN IT HAPPENED. PEOPLE DON'T JUST GO TO THE FISHPONDS TO FISH SOME GO TO THE FISHPONDS TO LAZE AROUND WHEN IT'S HOT. THERE ARE QUITE A FEW PONDS AND ALL OF THEM HAVE A LOT OF FISH IN THEM.
